summary: This bill, the Crow Tribe Water Rights Settlement Amendments Act of 2025, amends the Crow Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 2010. It redefines key terms related to water rights projects, repeals the MR&I System, and establishes a Crow CIP Implementation Account. The bill modifies the Crow Settlement Fund, specifying its management and uses, including funding for infrastructure projects and on-reservation land purchases. It also includes technical and conforming amendments throughout the original act, and addresses funding mechanisms and indexing for cost fluctuations.
